name: beU delivery
headline: Food delivery service in Africa
description: beU delivery is an on-demand food delivery service in Africa. We offer a great selection of local restaurants and door-to-door food delivery that allows the customer to have their favorite food from the comfort of their home or office. We are the #1 food delivery service in Ethiopia, deliver at significantly cheaper rate than our peers, making food delivery affordable for the mass. We plan to expand our services to new markets and eventually become the super app of Africa.
generated_description:
**beU Delivery: Revolutionizing Food Delivery in Africa**

Founded in 2021 and currently a standout member of Y Combinator’s W22 batch, **beU Delivery** is carving a niche as the leading on-demand food delivery service in Ethiopia. Headquartered in Addis Ababa, the company has grown to a robust team of 300 employees, driven by a singular mission: to make food delivery accessible and affordable for everyone in Africa.

At its core, beU Delivery provides a vast selection of local restaurants, allowing customers to have their favorite meals delivered straight to their homes or offices. They pride themselves on offering lower delivery rates than competitors, positioning themselves as the #1 choice in the region. With over 500 local and national restaurant partners, delivering a tantalizing variety of dishes, beU caters to diverse culinary cravings—from traditional Ethiopian fare to popular international cuisines.

The company's vision extends beyond just food delivery; they aim to evolve into a "super app" for Africa, which means they will expand their services across new markets and potentially unite various logistics needs under one platform.

**Key Highlights:**
- **Year Established:** 2021
- **Location:** Addis Ababa, Ethiopia
- **Team Size:** 300 employees
- **Target Market:** On-demand food delivery across Africa
- **Unique Selling Proposition:** Affordability and service speed
- **Future Goals:** Expansion and diversification into a comprehensive mobile app for all delivery needs

In simple terms, beU Delivery is not just about picking up food; it’s about creating a seamless experience for users to discover and enjoy meals, directly from their favorite local spots without breaking the bank.

To explore more about their offerings or to join their expanding network of restaurant partners, visit their website at [beudelivery.com](https://beudelivery.com/) and hop on the food delivery revolution in Africa!
